Body:
d_hbf = np.loadtxt(os.path.join(dirdat, 'hbf_bhattacharya11.txt'), unpack=True)
mf = ccl.halos.HaloBiasBhattacharya11(cosmo)
m = d_hbf[0]
for iz, z in enumerate(zs):
    hb_d = d_hbf[iz + 1]
    hb_h = mf.get_halo_bias(cosmo, m, 1.0 / (1 + z))
    assert np.all(np.fabs(hb_h / hb_d - 1) < 0.001)
